definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be or grow dark (cf. Ar. x.al=a be black, z.il=un shade; Eth. s’alala: be dark; As. ṣllu, shade, ṣalâlu, Pi.roof over, so Sab. [[טַלל]] [II.], [[טלת]] ceiling, roof, Hom:Chrest. 125, cf. Palm. [[תטלילא]]; OAram. [[טלל]] overshadow, Aram. [[טְלָלָא]], t.elolo0 shadow);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[חָֽלְלוּ שַׁעֲרֵי]] Ne 13:19 the gates of Jerusalem grew dark, i.e. evening came on.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[חׂרֶשׁ מֵחַל]] Ez Eze 31:3 a shadowing wood (but del. LXX. Co Toy Krae).
